explains: adv. 坐二等车；作为第二类邮件

sentences.en: He sat in the corner of a second-class compartment.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一个二等车厢的角落里。

sentences.en: Seven second-class passengers prepared to disembark.
sentences.cn: 7名二等舱的旅客准备下船了。

sentences.en: We were second-class citizens and they treated us as such.
sentences.cn: 我们是二等公民，他们也就这样对待我们。
